reviews.customers_say: Customers find the wrap cardigan soft, comfortable, and of high quality, with one noting it can be worn as outwear during warm weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money
items.body: This is my 2nd Barefoot Dreams wrap, and I am so glad I got it. I wanted one to keep at my office since the AC is always so low. It's perfect for keeping this Florida girl comfortable in 68 degrees. I love the elegant drape that smoothes out my silhouette without seeming bulky, and the way that the fabric is so light and soft yet just warm enough. The pewter color is a bit darker than expected but will go well with gray, blue, black and even most browns. And the pockets are functional, perfectly placed for hands and angled in such a way that a phone or keys won't slip out. I like the angle on them too, creates a smoother line. Just perfect! Read more
items.author: Van Gray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You Will Love This Soft "Cardigan" With Pockets!
items.body: I am 5'3 and can fluctuate between 155 and 165 pounds (a little larger when I ordered this the first time). I had the grey color in the past in the M/L size and it fit fine. I truly enjoy the Barefoot Dreams brand. This "beach throw" is truly a multi-purpose cardigan, sweater, wrap, etc. It has become like my "security blanket" of sorts! And, y'all, it has pockets (hallelujah chorus)! Not only would I buy it again, but I did! I lost mine, & when I looked and looked & still couldn't find it, I ordered another one. However, I live on an island and ride my bicycle around quite a bit. The length got in my way so I began wearing it with bottom (longer part) just tied in a knot on both sides. I ended up wearing it for several years. Recently, I ordered a S/M in the (nautical blue color) because I did want it to be a bit smaller. I love it. I do really love this fit better - but remember I am shooort! It is perfect for travel or when in the summer heat, we have the air conditioning turned up in stores offices and businesses. It perfect for an evening walk on the beach. Buy one - be careful though - it will spoil you! Read more
items.author: Michael P. Graham

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I could live in this thing
items.body: I am in love with this cardigan. Itâ€™s incredibly soft, but not heavy and bulky and is really stylish and pretty on. Itâ€™s also stretchy, so i didnâ€™t size up. Iâ€™m 5â€™6 135 lb and ordered the small/medium and itâ€™s perfect. I usually freeze in airports but this thing keeps nice and cozy. Itâ€™s perfect for traveling because the front has enough material to wrap around you like a blanket. My sister in law had one, and after trying it on once, I had to get one. Price is worth it. I havenâ€™t washed mine, but my sister in laws has held up nicely over the years. I got it in the taupe and the color is true to the picture and very pretty. Read more
items.author: Rachel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love anything from Barefoot Dreams
items.body: I love the Barefoot Dreams Products! I saw one of thir robes in a department store so I had the chance to try it on. I am 5â€™10â€ and 140 lb and wear a small/medium. The softness of these products is amazing. Warm and the right weight. I live in Holland now and love to put my robe on when home but feel like I donâ€™t want to wear night clothing during the day so the wrap, sweater type clothing items are great! I am allergic to wool and this is perfect! My robe is a blush color and my sweater wrap is gray. Love both. My new robe and sweater replaced my old robe that looked like a couch blanket. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Bartsch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic cozy EVERYTHING cardigan
items.body: I love Barefoot dreams. You feel spoiled just wearing it. I have several, but I really, really wanted pockets. So finallyâ€¦pockets v become popular. This style has little bit longer frame, and arms, the drape adds style, making this cardigan different. I just treated myself to a black one, then got another in lighter color. This gray/pewter-y colour is lovely, but will be returning for the taupe. Because I have wanted and never had tannish cardigan. Perfect weight, warmâ€¦not too warm. Weighty enough to look as.luxurious as it feels. Highly recommend BF items, this cardigan in particular. It will elevate daily leggings/tennies, or a dtess/heels. Works beautifully for us lankier people. BONUSâ€¦I have NOT had pilling issues. Which is a major problem with most soft sweaters. TREAT YOURSELFðŸ‘ðŸ¼ Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What is not to love?
items.body: This was a great deal and so soft and luxurious. Perfect gift and pretty color. You canâ€™t go wrong with BD! Read more
items.author: Kw79

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pearl is Ivory, not White
items.body: Comfy, cozy but Pearl is NOT white as pictured, for those of you who prefer cooler colors. It is ivory so has warm undertones, sadly. Read more
items.author: Serena Perry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for causal and formal wear.
items.body: Perfect for casual wear with leggings, jeans or slacks and pencil skirt. Fabric is so soft and comfy. Stylish and comfortable. Can be worn as outwear during warm weather and indoors at the office as a cardigan. Perfect fit and size. Read more
items.author: Paulina U

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pearl, Dove Gray, Black, Stone. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
